resonance.name: Sprawling Greenery
resonance.description: Elemental Mastery increased by 50. After triggering Burning, Quicken, or Bloom reactions, all nearby party members gain 30 Elemental Mastery for 6s. After triggering Aggravate, Spread, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, all nearby party members gain 20 Elemental Mastery for 6s. The durations of the aforementioned effects will be counted independently

reactions.name: Bloom
reactions.description: Creates a Dendro Core that explodes after 6 seconds, dealing AoE Dendro damage

reactions.name: Hyperbloom
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Electro to a Dendro Core. Transforms the Dendro Core into a homing Sprawling Shot that deals increased AoE Dendro damage in a much smaller AoE

reactions.name: Burgeon
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Pyro to a Dendro Core. Detonates the Dendro Core immediately, dealing increased AoE Dendro damage

reactions.name: Aggravate
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Electro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Flat Damage Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction

reactions.name: Spread
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Dendro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Flat Damage Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction

reactions.name: Burning
reactions.description: Deals Pyro damage over time in a small AoE and applies Pyro to nearby targets
